title: When (AMD) Moves Investors should Listen
text:
March 29, 2024, 14:00 pm ET, BY Rick W.- Contributor| Editor: Thomas H. Kee Jr. (Follow on LinkedIn) Longer Term Trading Plans for AMD

Buy AMD slightly over 168.32 target 195.78 stop loss @ 167.83  Details
The technical summary data tells us to buy AMD near 168.32 with an upside target of 195.78.  This data also tells us to set a stop loss @ 167.83 to protect against excessive loss in case the stock begins to move against the trade.  168.32 is the first level of support below 180.49 , and by rule, any test of support is a buy signal.  In this case, support 168.32 is being tested, a buy signal would exist.
Short AMD slightly under 195.78, target 168.32, stop loss @ 196.35  Details
The technical summary data is suggesting a short of AMD as it gets near 195.78 with a downside target of 168.32.  We should have a stop loss in place at 196.35though. 195.78 is the first level of resistance above 180.49, and by rule, any test of resistance is a short signal.  In this case, if resistance 195.78 is being tested, a short signal would exist. 

Swing Trading Plans for AMD

Buy AMD slightly over 195.78, target n/a, Stop Loss @ 195.21  Details
If 195.78 begins to break higher, the technical summary data tells us to buy AMD just slightly over 195.78, with an upside target of n/a.  The data also tells us to set a stop loss @ 195.21 in case the stock turns against the trade.  195.78 is the first level of resistance above 180.49, and by rule, any break above resistance is a buy signal.  In this case, 195.78, initial resistance, would be breaking higher, so a buy signal would exist.  Because this plan is based on a break of resistance, it is referred to as a Long Resistance Plan.
Short AMD slightly  near 195.78, target 179.95, Stop Loss @ 196.35.  Details
The technical summary data is suggesting a short of AMD if it tests 195.78 with a downside target of 179.95. We should have a stop loss in place at 196.35 though in case the stock begins to move against the trade.  By rule, any test of resistance is a short signal.  In this case, if resistance, 195.78, is being tested a short signal would exist.  Because this plan is a short plan based on a test of resistance it is referred to as a Short Resistance Plan.
